text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-xPhysicalVerbalParticipationMode

Language: en

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationMode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    PHYSICALphysical presenceParticipation by direct action where subject and actor are in the same location. (The participation involves more than communication.)
    VERBALverbalParticipation by voice communication

name: XPhysicalVerbalParticipationMode
title: x_PhysicalVerbalParticipationMode
description: Restricts participation to either physical or verbal
